item.title: No beard glitch
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
item.description:
@weeddamn wrote:

Im currently using allstarscape source (I know shitty…) And iv been looking at old tutorials from 2008 to find a Beard Fix.

What i mean is look here.

Iv looked thorugh all of the tutorials on R-S (org) , moparscape, google, sythe.org, etc. And none of them work correctly for me I all keep getting errors, or my player in-game head will spin around and my username would change, etc. anyone help? heres my players.java code

if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerLegs]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pLegs); } if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHands); } 

        if (!Item4.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat])
                && !Item4.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) {
            playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead);
        } else {
            playerProps.writebyte(0);
        }

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pFeet); }

Read full topic
